div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: " + data:backgroundPositionStyleStr + "; " + data:widthStyleStr + "min-height: " + data:height + "_height: " + data:height + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "

div.p: Sorry, the page you were looking for in this blog does not exist.

a.span: You are viewing Most Recent Post

b:widget.title: 15 Years of Building Community Through Art

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: We created projects that connect, celebrate, and uplift Filipino communities through artistic expression. This is the story of how a group of Filipino artists built platforms, told stories, and fostered community, one ambitious project at a time.

OBRA Inc. (Organisasyon ng Batikan at Respetadong Artista ng Bayan, Incorporated) is a non-stock, non-profit cultural association formally established in December 2007 to develop, uplift and promote Filipino skills and talents through art as the medium. We have served as a cultural force dedicated to shaping and uplifting the Filipino national identity through purposeful, high-impact creative interventions.
